state.response: چین نے اولمپک کھیلوں میں پہلی بار شرکت 1952 میں کی۔
claims: China participated in the Olympic Games for the first time in 1952.

state.response: چین نے اولمپک کھیلوں میں پہلی بار شرکت 1952 میں کی۔
claims: China participated in the Olympic Games for the first time in 1952.

China participated in the Olympic Games: When did China first participate in the Olympic Games? China Olympic Games debut year

Originally having participated in Olympics as the delegation of the Republic of China (ROC) from 1924 to 1948, China competed at the Olympic Games under the name of the People's Republic of China (PRC) for the first time at the 1952 Summer Olympics held in Helsinki, Finland, although they only arrived in time during ...
When did China first participate in the Olympic Games? China Olympic Games debut year

The People's Republic of China made its Olympic debut at the 1952 Summer Games in Helsinki. Since the resumption of PR China's lawful seat in the IOC in 1979, Chinese athletes have had more opportunities to compete internationally.
